Description: Annual statistical release evaluating the extent of rough sleeping
Name: Rough sleeping
Notes: This file may not be suitable for users of assistive technology. Request an accessible format. please email alternativeformats@communities.gov.uk. Please tell us what format you need. It will help us if you say what assistive technology you use.
Producer: Ministry for Housing, Communities and Local Government (MHCLG)
Route from landing page to data: Data can be located on the landing page by scrolling down the page to 'Rough sleeping tables'  click on the latest publication this will open an XLS spreadsheet however other formats may be available please see notes for details of how to request.
Sizing Notes: A machine readable  version of this document in a more accessible format, please email alternativeformats@communities.gov.uk. Please tell us what format you need. It will help us if you say what assistive technology you use.
